scripts.dev: npm run clean && concurrently -c "blue,green" -n "files,types" "npm run tsup:watch" "tsc --build --force --pretty --preserveWatchOutput --verbose --diagnostics --watch"
scripts.build: npm run clean && concurrently -c "blue,green" -n "files,types" "npm run tsup" "tsc --build --force --pretty --preserveWatchOutput --verbose --diagnostics"
scripts.build:no:check: npm run clean && concurrently -c "blue,green" -n "files,types" "npm run tsup" "tsc --build --noCheck --force --pretty --preserveWatchOutput --verbose --diagnostics"
